title.rendered: Le Grand Paris: building the city of the future

content.rendered:
The lat est issue of VINCI Constructions’ magazine 360 focuses on the Grand Paris project. 
Other topics are :  

Why


CONVERSATION
Is more affordable housing possible?

TRENDS
Building a world attentive to biodiversity


What


CHALLENGES
The strengths of the construction-concession model

How


INNOVATION
Reinventing the city, underground and above ground

FACTS AND FIGURES: 1,820 metres

SNAPSHOTS
Yamal, a look bac at an exceptional project

BUILDER STORIES
Freyssinet, the start-up spirit since 1928

Download the magazine

excerpt.rendered: Discover the topics of the latest issue of our magazine 360
